```{r setup, include = FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(plotly)
library(crosstalk)

pokemon <- read_csv("pokemon.csv")
```

SidebarName {.sidebar}
----------------------

Column
-------------------------------------

### Component 1

```{r}
p1 <- ggplot(pokemon, aes(x = reorder(`Type 1`, Total, FUN = median),
                          y = Total, fill = `Type 1`)) +
  geom_boxplot() +
  labs(x = "Type of Pokemon")

ggplotly(p1)
```

Column
-------------------------------------

### Component 2

```{r}
p <- ggplot(pokemon, aes(x = Defense, y = Attack, color = `Type 1`)) +
  geom_point() +
  labs(title = "Attack vs Defense by Type 1",
       x = "Defense",
       y = "Attack")

ggplotly(p)
```
